title: City of Stars
description: This Oscar-winning song captures the longing and hope that defines Mia and Sebastian's relationship.

title: Another Day of Sun
description: The opening musical number was filmed in a highway traffic jam and required over 100 dancers.

title: Mia & Sebastian's Theme
description: This recurring melody represents the couple's love story and appears throughout the film.

title: Someone in the Crowd
description: This song represents Mia's hope that someone important will notice her talent.

title: Epilogue
description: The 6-minute finale shows what could have been, featuring jazz, ballet, and tap dance.
